## Loading required R packages

readxl: to read data from xl sheet
tidyverse: for data manipulation and visualization

```{r}
library("readxl")
library("tidyverse")
```

## Examples of data
```{r}
basketball <- read_excel("Basketball.xlsx")
basketball <- basketball %>%
  rename(
    "Height" = "X1",
    "Weight" = "X2",
    "GoalsPercentage" = "X3",
    "ThrowsPercentage" = "X4",
    "AveragePointsScored" = "X5"
  )
head(basketball, 30)
```


## Building model

```{r}
model <- lm(AveragePointsScored ~ Height + Weight + GoalsPercentage + ThrowsPercentage, data = basketball)
summary(model)
```

## Interpretation

```{r}
confint(model)
```
